name: GGJ#17 - The adventures of Louie the Louse
name_original: GGJ#17 - The adventures of Louie the Louse
description:
GGJ#17 - The adventures of Louie the Louse is a platformer game developed by Canis_Lupus. It came out on 22-01-2017.
GGJ#17 - The adventures of Louie the Louse is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
